title: Design and Implementation Project of a Gamified Online Learning Model for Universities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform usage and foundational social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Most learners are job seekers with social sector practical experience, familiar with digital devices but lacking systematic gamification design experience.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more gamification elements suitable for case-based scenarios
Learners conceptualize and prototype a digital badge system applicable to project-based learning
Learners refine a gamification model through peer assessment and present a scenario executable at least once in an offline environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
